InstructionData.Author: Noob
InstructionData.Instructions:
alias pipepr d0 alias meow d1
s pipepr On 1 s meow On 1
main: #yield l r1 pipepr Activate beqz r0 machinepending beq r1 1 machineactive j main
machinepending: l r1 pipepr Activate #yield beqz r1 machinepending #yield beq r1 1 machineactive
machineactive: l r1 pipepr Activate #yield beq r1 1 machineactive #yield beqz r1 machinestop
machinestop: l r1 pipepr Activate #sleep 10 s meow On 0 s pipepr On 0 s pipepr On 0 s pipepr On 0
